abstract: In 2005, a semi-closed Brooklyn tuner shop reemerged with meticulously crafted and modernized versions the Chevrolet muscle car.
snippet: In 2005, a semi-closed Brooklyn tuner shop reemerged with meticulously crafted and modernized versions the Chevrolet muscle car.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp

lead_paragraph: In Sunday's Automobiles section, Ro McGonegal spends time with the latest creation from Baldwin-Motion and delves into the back story of the Brooklyn-born tuner shop, which built customized Chevrolet performance cars from 1967 to 1975.

headline.main: A '69 Camaro, From the Ground Up
